Class Sorter

java.lang.Object
  Sorter

 class Sorter

extends Object

The Sorter class sorts all records by names, IDs, homeforms and periods.

Method Detail

sort

public static String[][] sort(String[][] list,
                              int item)
Constructor for the sort method. This method sorts the records.txt data into what the user specified (i.e. by Name, ID, etc.)

Parameters:
list - [][] The file records.txt.
item - The item that is being sorted (Name, ID, Homeform, etc.).
Returns:
The new sorted list is returned.

Parameters:
